The Panasonic 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type CS-VC12VKY) increases energy efficiency without compromising functionality when powered by 220V–240V electricity. This air conditioner strikes a balance between cooling power and efficiency. Its solid build is a testament to Panasonic's commitment to quality. The Panasonic 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type ECONAVI CS-S10PKH) is a smart and efficient cooling solution that prioritizes comfort, energy savings, and air quality. It efficiently eliminates PM2.5 particles from the air thanks to Nanoe-G technology, guaranteeing cleaner indoor air for better living conditions. Up to 65% of energy is saved by the Intelligent Eco Sensors of Econavi technology, which optimize energy use by modifying cooling power based on activity levels and room occupancy. With a Blue Fin condenser that improves performance and longevity, the Panasonic 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type ECONAVI CS-S10PKH) guarantees effective cooling even under challenging circumstances. This 1-ton capacity unit is ideal for wall-mounted split installation and can be installed in rooms up to 100 square feet in size, with a maximum height of 10 feet, excluding upper floors. It uses 225–920 watts when running on a single-phase power source and has a cooling capacity of 2,860–11,200 Btu/h. Its efficiency is highlighted by its 5-star energy rating, and its silent mode operation guarantees little disruption. The one-ton Panasonic AC With an EER of 12.6 Btu/hW and a cooling capacity of 9,550 Btu/h, provides strong yet economical cooling performance. In addition, the unit has a 1.6 L/h moisture removal rate and a 10.1 m³/min air circulation rate, which guarantees even and comfortable cooling throughout the space. All things considered, the Panasonic 1-Ton Inverter AC (Split Type ECONAVI CS-S10PKH) offers cutting-edge technologies together with intelligent, environmentally responsible, and dependable cooling performance to satisfy contemporary comfort demands.
